content.description:
Climb the first three bolts of "The Devil's Lettuce" before breaking out left past two bolts to join the anchor for gas station pills.



On the gently overhanging wall at Secret Garden.

5 Bolts, Rap Ring Anchor

Start by stick clipping the first bolt then move into a boulder problem on a series of left facing holds. After clipping the second bolt enjoy the nice jugs all the way to the top.



Starts to the left of devil’s lettuce on the slightly overhanging face.

Bolts and rap anchor

Follow the obvious ledgy ramp trending up and right across the wall. After the 4th bolt, continue straight up on excellent edges.

Feel free to stick clip the second bolt. It can be a bit hard to clip on lead and a fall would not be ideal.


On the gently overhanging wall at Secret Garden. Obvious ledges/ramp that diagonals up and right across the wall.
5 bolts, rap ring anchor

Follow seam in a corner taking advantage of some useful face hold on your way to a ledge, from the ledge clip a bolt and mantle the lip (Crux). Clip one more bolt and move slightly left to top out. Bolted anchor shared with Hold My Drill.


On the left side of a blocky slightly overhanging face, there is two seams that go up short dihedrals. This one climbs the left most dihedral.  Located to the right of Hold My Drill.

2 bolts, few small-medium cams, nuts.

climbs.name: Gas Station Boner Pills
climbs.fa: F. Côté, E. Côté 2021.  Equipped by C. Mazurkiewicz

content.description:
A nice power endurance route.

Start on the ramp that diagonals right. After the second bolt, make tenuous moves up and left to the 3rd bolt then straight up more powerful moves before reaching better holds.

Feel free to stick clip the second bolt. The rope runs nicer that way.



Starts on the ledgy ramp that diagonals across the face of Secret Garden. At the second bolt, breaks off left and straight up the wall.

4-5 bolts, rap rings

Start near the base of the slab and gain the face. Fun climbing leads to a high crux. Just go for it! This route was bolted while holding someone else's drill.


Found around the arrete on a left facing wall, to the right of the open book corner. 
4 bolts, bolted anchor

Start at bottom of protruding slab block. Make your way up fun slab layback, to an obvious dihedral, layback and use face folds through crux. Top out on the upper left face. Abundant protection the whole way 

Locate slab ramp in the right corner of broken up wall. This route climbs the seam that runs the length of the right side.
4-5 pieces of natural gear tree anchor.

This is a variation start to Exposed and Composed that climbs the corner just right of the original route. 
Climb boldly into the corner with PG gear. At the top of the corner, mantle onto the ledge and join Exposed and Composed.



Start in the corner just left of the arête at Secret garden and about 2m right of the corner of Exposed and Composed.

a few small to medium cams, 2 bolts, bolted anchor

climbs.name: The Radical Hedge
climbs.fa: F. Côté, E. Côté, C. Mazurkiewicz

content.description:
Start just left of Hold My Drill and climb up good holds to the first bolt. Continue straight up to a small right facing corner and follow it to the top. 

This climb is harder than it looks and will test your footwork.



Bolted line in the middle of the not-quite-vertical west facing wall at Secret Garden. Just right of the corner of Long Story Short.

4 bolts, rap rings
Short cliff with interesting features. Good rock quality. Currently needs some landscaping and has some large blocks that need to be trundled.
